definition: A substance or material that is placed inside an object or structure to occupy space, provide support, or enhance its functionality. It is commonly used in various contexts, such as in culinary arts, where it is typically employed to refer to the filling of pastries, cakes, or other food items.

examples.german: Die Füllung des Kuchens besteht aus Schokolade.
examples.english: The filling of the cake consists of chocolate.

examples.german: Die Füllung der Kissen ist aus Federn.
examples.english: The filling of the pillows is made of feathers.

examples.german: Die Füllung des Donuts ist mit Marmelade.
examples.english: The filling of the donut is with jam.

examples.german: Die Füllung der Pralinen ist mit Nüssen.
examples.english: The filling of the chocolates is with nuts.

examples.german: Die Füllung der Torten ist oft aus Sahne.
examples.english: The filling of the pies is often made of cream.
